name: Detail-Oriented
descr: To ensure the quality of the projects, I focus a lot on details and fix minor bugs and errors

name: Responsible
descr: I never stop until the requirements are fully met, and the people involved in the development process are satisfied with the result.

name: Curious
descr: I love to think about better ways to improve on projects, and myself.

name: User-Centered
descr: Throughout the whole development process, I constantly remind myself who will be using the product, so that I can create a product that they can easily use and benefit from
